channel.title: New pvp survival server! factions and economy!
channel.description: Hello, this is a fellow Admin from Helmet Craft! IP: mc.helmetcraft.com <http://mc.helmetcraft.com/> I am sniper242 and we are now opening our server to new members! It is 24/7 with factions, pvp, griefing, raiding, economy, chest shops, and everything you could ever want! We have staff available almost at all times to assist your needs! We also sell plots/shops at the spawn! We are a brand new server and need many members! Join us and have fun! Good luck in PVP! Thank you!
